Action.author: yacovm
Action.body: What is the mechanism that ensures the chaincode server now knows it is the peer that connected to it, and not someone else (i.e - a client, or some other peer)?

Action.author: muralisr
Action.body: This is now done in github https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FABCG-3, https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FABCG-4, https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FABCG-5
